title: Accel-KKR Banks $1.35 Billion for New Growth Fund
sub_head: The firm mainly makes minority investments in founder-backed technology companies through its growth funds
body:
Founder-focused private-equity firm Accel-KKR has closed on $1.35 billion for its latest growth-capital fund amid a frenzy of investment firms collecting money earmarked for the technology sector.
The vehicle, Accel-KKR Growth Capital Partners IV LP, is almost twice as large as its predecessor, which closed with $685 million in 2019. That...
